abstract: A footnote to Apple’s presentation–the ability of the AppleTV to play video podcasts–may be the most important announcement because it opens a path for free, ad-supported programs from many sources to get onto televisions.
snippet: A footnote to Apple’s presentation–the ability of the AppleTV to play video podcasts–may be the most important announcement because it opens a path for free, ad-supported programs from many sources to get onto televisions.
lead_paragraph: While Steve Jobs talked for a long time Tuesday at Macworld Expo about the movie rental feature of iTunes and Apple TV, he spent only a short time demonstrating its capabilities for podcasts. In fact, the ability of Apple TV to view podcasts may in the long run be its most important feature.

headline.main: Video Podcasts: The Sleeping Giant on AppleTV
